      Fear of Flying-Some Statistics

    <div class="cc01" id="e16">
     <p>
      <font size="4">
       Welcome to our "Flying Phobia Help" Website for those of you with a fear of flying in Houston, Galveston, San Antonio, Austin,  
 		Beaumont, Dallas and other cities in Texas and Louisiana. Do you get anxious about getting on an airplane or avoid flying altogether? If  
 		so, our
      </font>
      <font size="4">
       <a href="flying_phobia_help_008.htm">
        Workshop
       </a>
      </font>
      <font size="4">
      </font>
      <font size="4">
       held in Houston, Texas will help you overcome your fear  
 		of flying. Only program with virtual reality and a flight simulator.
      </font>
     </p>
    </div>
